channel.title: CVE Feed for Gesio (GESTIÓN INTEGRAL ONLINE, SL) -- GESIO ERP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gesio (GESTIÓN INTEGRAL ONLINE, SL) -- GESIO ERP

item.title: CVE-2020-8967|2024-08-04T10:19:18.207Z -- gesio%20%28gesti%C3%B3n%20integral%20online%2C%20sl%29 -- gesio%20erp
item.description: There is an improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command (SQL Injection) vulnerability in php files of GESIO ERP. GESIO ERP all versions prior to 11.2 allows malicious users to retrieve all database information.
